component.elkm1.config.step.manual_conne: The IP address or domain or serial port if connecting via serial.
A unique prefix (leave blank if you only have one ElkM1).

The address string must be in the form 'address[:port]' for 'secure' and 'non-secure'. Example: '192.168.1.1'. The port is optional and defaults to 2101 for 'non-secure' and 2601 for 'secure'. For the serial protocol, the address must be in the form 'tty[:baud]'. Example: '/dev/ttyS1'. The baud is optional and defaults to 115200.

component.hassio.issues.issue_mount_moun: Nevarēja piemērot labojumu. Lai iegūtu sīkāku informāciju, pārbaudiet žurnālus.

Nevarēja izveidot savienojumu ar `{reference}`. Lai iegūtu sīkāku informāciju, pārbaudiet resursdatora žurnālus, vai nav kļūdu.

Mēģiniet izveidot savienojumu vēlreiz. Ja nepieciešams atjaunināt `{reference}`, dodieties uz [storage]({storage_url}).
component.hassio.issues.issue_system_doc: Viena vai vairākas restartēšanas neizdevās. Lai iegūtu sīkāku informāciju, skatiet Supervisor žurnālus.

Ir mainīta papildinājumu un ioBroker noklusējuma konfigurācija. Lai atjauninātu konfigurāciju ar jaunajiem noklusējuma iestatījumiem, ir nepieciešams restartēt:

- {components}
component.hassio.issues.issue_system_mul: Neizdevās pārdēvēt failu sistēmu. Lai iegūtu plašāku informāciju, skatiet Supervisor žurnālus.

`{reference}` ir failu sistēma ar nosaukumu hassos-data un nav aktīvais datu disks. Tas var izraisīt to, ka ioBroker sistēma restartēšanas laikā izvēlas nepareizu datu disku.

Lai to novērstu, izmantojiet labošanas opciju, lai pārdēvētu failu sistēmu. Varat arī pārvietot datu disku uz šo disku (pārrakstot tā saturu) vai izņemt šo disku no sistēmas.
component.hassio.issues.issue_system_reb: Nevarēja pārstartēt sistēmu. Lai iegūtu sīkāku informāciju, pārbaudiet žurnālus.

Tika mainīti iestatījumi, lai tie stātos spēkā, nepieciešama sistēmas restartēšana.

Šis labojums izraisīs sistēmas pārstartēšanu, kuras rezultātā ioBroker un visi papildinājumi uz īsu brīdi būs nepieejami.

component.hassio.issues.unsupported_conn: System is unsupported because ioBroker cannot determine when an internet connection is available. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.

component.hassio.issues.unsupported_dbus: System is unsupported because D-Bus is working incorrectly. Many things fail without this as Supervisor cannot communicate with the host. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_dns_: System is unsupported because the provided DNS server does not work correctly and the fallback DNS option has been disabled. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.

component.hassio.issues.unsupported_job_: System is unsupported because one or more job conditions have been disabled which protect from unexpected failures and breakages. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.

component.hassio.issues.unsupported_netw: System is unsupported because Network Manager is missing, inactive or misconfigured. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_os.d: System is unsupported because the operating system in use is not tested or maintained for use with Supervisor. Use the link to which operating systems are supported and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_os_a: System is unsupported because OS-Agent is missing, inactive or misconfigured. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_rest: System is unsupported because a Docker container has a restart policy set which could cause issues on startup. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_soft: System is unsupported because additional software outside the ioBroker ecosystem has been detected. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_sour: System is unsupported because Supervisor source code has been modified. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.
component.hassio.issues.unsupported_supe: System is unsupported because an out-of-date version of Supervisor is in use and auto-update has been disabled. Use the link to learn more and how to fix this.

```yaml
{yaml_example}```

Please remove the deprecated `imap_email_plaform` sensor configuration from your `configuration.yaml`.

component.imap_email_content.issues.migr: The IMAP server config was already migrated to the imap integration. Remove the `imap_email_plaform` sensor configuration from your `configuration.yaml`.
Migration failed. Failed to connect to the IMAP server. Perform a manual migration.

In this step an `imap` config entry will be set up with the following configuration:

```text
Server	{server}
Port	{port}
Username	{username}
Password	*****
Folder	{folder}
```

See also: (https://embed.windy.com/embed2.html?lat=32.487&lon=-84.023&zoom=5&level=surface&overlay=rain&menu=&message=&marker=&calendar=&pressure=&type=map&location=coordinates&detail=&detailLat=32.487&detailLon=--84.023&metricWind=default&metricTemp=default&radarRange=-1/integrations/imap/)

Fitering configuration on allowed `sender` is part of the template sensor config that can copied and placed in your `configuration.yaml.

Note that the event filter only filters on the first of the configured allowed senders, customize the filter if needed.

```yaml
{yaml_example}```
Do not forget to cleanup the your `configuration.yaml` after migration.

Submit to migrate your IMAP server configuration to an `imap` configuration entry.

IMAP e-pasta satura integrācija ir atcelta. Jūsu IMAP servera konfigurāciju var automātiski migrēt uz [imap integrācija](https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/config_flow_start?domain=imap), kas ļaus izmantot pielāgotu `imap` notikuma trigeri. Lai iestatītu sensoru ar IMAP satura stāvokli, var izmantot šablona sensoru. Pēc migrācijas noņemiet sensora `imap_email_plaform` konfigurāciju failā `configuration.yaml`.

Apstipriniet, lai sāktu IMAP servera konfigurācijas migrāciju uz `imap` integrāciju.

Set the options for the ISY Integration: 
 • Node Sensor String: Any device or folder that contains 'Node Sensor String' in the name will be treated as a sensor or binary sensor.

 • Variable Sensor String: Any variable that contains 'Variable Sensor String' will be added as a sensor. 
 • Restore Light Brightness: If enabled, the previous brightness will be restored when turning on a light instead of the device's built-in On-Level.

component.mqtt.options.step.options.desc:
Discovery - If discovery is enabled (recommended), ioBroker will automatically discover devices and entities which publish their configuration on the MQTT broker. If discovery is disabled, all configuration must be done manually.
Discovery prefix - The prefix a configuration topic for automatic discovery must start with.
Birth message - The birth message will be sent each time ioBroker (re)connects to the MQTT broker.
Will message - The will message will be sent each time ioBroker loses its connection to the broker, both in case of a clean (e.g. ioBroker shutting down) and in case of an unclean (e.g. ioBroker crashing or losing its network connection) disconnect.

App Auth has been deprecated by Google to improve security, and you need to take action by creating new application credentials.

Open the [documentation]({more_info_url}) to follow along as the next steps will guide you through the steps you need to take to restore access to your Nest devices.
component.nest.config.step.cloud_project: Enter the Cloud Project ID below e.g. *example-project-12345*. See the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}) or the documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).
component.nest.config.step.create_cloud_:
The Nest integration allows you to integrate your Nest Thermostats, Cameras, and Doorbells using the Smart Device Management API. The SDM API **requires a US $5** one time setup fee. See documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

1. Go to the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}).
1. If this is your first project, click **Create Project** then **New Project**.
1. Give your Cloud Project a Name and then click **Create**.
1. Save the Cloud Project ID e.g. *example-project-12345* as you will need it later
1. Go to API Library for [Smart Device Management API]({sdm_api_url}) and click **Enable**.
1. Go to API Library for [Cloud Pub/Sub API]({pubsub_api_url}) and click **Enable**.

Proceed when your cloud project is set up.
Nest: Create and configure Cloud Project
component.nest.config.step.device_projec:
Create a Nest Device Access project which **requires paying Google a US $5 fee** to set up.
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}), and through the payment flow.
1. Click on **Create project**
1. Give your Device Access project a name and click **Next**.
1. Enter your OAuth Client ID
1. Enable events by clicking **Enable** and **Create project**.

Enter your Device Access Project ID below ([more info]({more_info_url})).
Nest: Create a Device Access Project

Update the Nest Device Access Project with your new OAuth Client ID ([more info]({more_info_url}))
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}).
1. Click the trash icon next to *OAuth Client ID*.
1. Click the `...` overflow menu and *Add Client ID*.
1. Enter your new OAuth Client ID and click **Add**.

Your OAuth Client ID is: `{client_id}`

 - `serial://[LOCAL DEVICE]` for a local Modbus RTU connection
 - `rfc2217://[HOST]:[PORT]` for a remote telnet based Modbus RTU connection.

component.xbox_live.issues.pending_remov:
The Xbox Live integration is pending removal from ioBroker and will no longer be available as of ioBroker 2023.2.

The integration is being removed, because it is only useful for the legacy device Xbox 360 and the upstream API now requires a paid subscription. Newer consoles are supported by the Xbox integration for free.

Remove the Xbox Live YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart ioBroker to fix this issue.
